_reward_comment: To find your custom reward id. Enable the above to 'true'. Go to your twitch and use the CUSTOM channel reward you want.

bot._enabled_comment: true = bot will respond in chat
bot.name: spotifyq
bot._oauth_comment: get oauth by logging in and going to https://twitchapps.com/tmi/
bot.response: /me @{user} successfuly added the song '{song} by {artists}' to the Spotify queue.
bot._response_comment: {user} = twitch username | {song} = song name | {artists} = list of artists. Must use ALL variables

history._what_is_it: Whenever a user requests a song it will be added to the playlist
